title: Kallista's current state.
body: So Kallista has been trash since season 6 and we are now in preseason 7 with still no hope of her getting any better due to all of the shields in the game and what not you are gonna miss your rend and her lack of damage early game makes her laning phase unbearable. I have an idea though. What would happen if her Rend did true damage if the enemy champ was below say 20 or 15% health but it needed a certain amount of stacks to create the true damage. It would maybe not be broken but would require good use of the stacking of her spears and timing to get it right it could help. I don't know it was a shower thought.

replies.body: isnt she getting a buff to her rend already on the pbe?

Exactly! She has a buff coming, I don't think it'll fully fix her, but it's going to make her better to play for sure. She's one of my absolute favorite champs in the game, so I'm extremely looking forward to it.

just read the ff@20 notes, that rend full refund is guna make her farming alot easier but i dont think it did anything to her damage, unless you count the stacks persisting even if its on cooldown. but i dont think she needs any more damage, especially with all the utility she has

I just looked into it and I like the changes in all honesty the rend stacks persisting is going to help her damage output immensely I believe to the point where she is actually playable again. thanks for all the input you guys have given!
now i get to wait for the tali buffs
She and Azir are getting buffs on PBE right now. They're fixing these champs, don't worry.
Thank you for letting me know this I have no idea how to check whats in the PBE other than youtubers and what not so this is great news!
